FuncDef: This command configures the range of the Segment Routing Global Block (SRGB). It is a label block which is used for assigning labels to segment routing prefix SIDs originated by this router. This range is carved from the system dynamic label range and is not instantiated by default.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the start label value in the SRGB. Values-18432 to 524287 within dynamic label range | 1048575 (FP4 only).
Specifies the end label value in the SRGB. Values-18432 to 524287 within dynamic label range | 1048575 (FP4 only).
